title: What are the possible risks and limitations of hypnotism according to experts in the field?
first_phrase: In this last part of the text, the author addresses the concerns raised by doctors and other experts regarding the dangers of hypnotism and magnetism. They refute the claims that suggest that these practices increase the number of criminals in society. The text also highlights the opinions of doctors Bernheim and Cullerre, who argue that these fears are unfounded. However, some experts, such as Professor Liegeois, have raised concerns about the possibility of criminal acts being committed under hypnosis. Finally, the article discusses the issue of doctors monopolizing the field of hypnosis and magnetism, and the need for honesty and recognition of the pioneers of the field. The author concludes by referring to Donato's article on "persistent suggestion", which provides an excellent analysis of the issue of hypnosis and its possible impacts.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the history of superstition and misguided beliefs in sorcery, possession, and demonic epidemics has had a terrible impact on humanity. However, in modern times, these suggested superstitions will disappear under the light of scientific truth. The article by Donato on persistent suggestion gives insights into the use of the fascination technique in criminal investigations, highlighting the importance of free consent in the practice. While there may be debates and struggles for recognition among different professionals, what matters most is serving the truth with honesty and integrity.
